snippet: Apple Inc said it plans to offer rewards of up to $200,000 (£152,433) to researchers who find critical security bugs in its products, joining dozens of firms that already offer payments for help uncovering flaws in their products.

headline.main: Apple Offers Big Cash Rewards for Help Finding Security Bugs
headline.print_headline: Apple Offers Big Cash Rewards for Help Finding Security Bugs

snippet: Apple Inc deserved the hundreds of millions of dollars in damages Samsung Electronics Co Ltd paid for infringing patented designs of the iPhone, because the product's  distinctive look drives people to purchase it, a group of design industry profe...

headline.main: Designers Come Out for Apple in Patent Fight With Samsung
headline.print_headline: Designers Come Out for Apple in Patent Fight With Samsung

snippet: After just one firm raised one-quarter of all funding in the second quarter, midsize investors are facing a future in which they could be squeezed out.

headline.main: Daily Report: Venture Capital’s Endangered Middle Class

snippet: Jim Prosser, Twitter Inc's head of corporate, revenue and policy communications, said on Thursday he was leaving the microblogging website to join online lender SoFi.

headline.main: Twitter Loses Another Corporate Communications Executive
headline.print_headline: Twitter Loses Another Corporate Communications Executive

snippet: The Justice Department said on Thursday that it will not alter consent decrees that it originally reached with ASCAP and BMI in 1941 but would require the licensing organizations to change how they collect royalties, prompting a furious response.

headline.main: Justice Department to Require Changes to Music Royalty Collection
headline.print_headline: Justice Department to Require Changes to Music Royalty Collection

snippet: Besides dazzling feats of athleticism, dazzling new technologies will be on display at the Olympics.

headline.main: Olympics Offers Showcase for Tech Such as VR, Payments Ring
headline.print_headline: Olympics Offers Showcase for Tech Such as VR, Payments Ring

snippet: Crystal Webb cringes whenever a patrol car appears in her rearview mirror. She also never wants to see the inside of a police station again.

headline.main: Poll: Police Harassment Familiar to Young Blacks, Hispanics
headline.print_headline: Poll: Police Harassment Familiar to Young Blacks, Hispanics

snippet: The cable giant will provide 6,800 hours of programming on 11 channels and 41 live streams — and, for some viewers, a way to find it all.

headline.main: Betting Billions on Rio, Comcast Hopes to Win the Future of Television
headline.print_headline: Betting Billions on Rio, Comcast Hopes to Win TV’s Future

snippet: If accomplished, that feat would win the company, Moon Express, the Google Lunar X Prize competition and an accompanying $20 million reward.
abstract: Moon Express announces it has received Federal Aviation Administration's approval to land robotic lander on moon; if successful, small start-up would win Google Lunar X Prize, which gives first private organization to reach moon $20 million reward.

headline.main: Florida Company Gets Approval to Put Robotic Lander on Moon
headline.print_headline: Florida Company Gets Approval to Land Robot on Moon
